entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 3:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow late this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
